reviews.review: One the best games of eSports ;)

Counter Strike: Global Offensive is a very great game, if you don`t mind the russians.
Other than that, EVERYONE should own this game, it`s so fucking good!
Acho que o Counter Strike deveria mudar a forma como os tiros registam!! :D

ótimo jogo, jogo à 2 anos, tenho 2 reclamações só, 1- é ser o melhor FPS do mundo e não ter um anti-cheat, estamos todos cansados de apanhar cheaters. 2- Não ser 128 ticks, seria uma experiencia muito melhor
Güzel güncellemelerle daha iyi olabilir tek sorunu hilelere hala çözüm bulamayışı :(
el juega mas piola del mundo perri you know
this is still an amazing game

Худшая игра, в которую я когда-либо играл.
Античит - привет, пока.
128 тикрейт на оф серваках ? - нет спасибо, зачем, если есть Faceit.
Сделать игру бесплатной, чтобы играли даже бомжи на помойках с 775 сокетом ? - давайте.
Любимое дитя 2020 ? Нет, здесь будут любить лишь вашу мать.
3 из 10.
aq adam duvarın arkasında ateş edüüüü kafama geldi aneeeeyy
уберите пж читеров , а так игра отличная
Her zamanki gibi çok iyi fakat yapımcıların oyuna ilgisi sıfır.
is dumm einfach ge vac bannt wow
Good game but ruined by fucking hacker.

Conserva la esencia después de tantos años y que ahora sea gratuito es un puntazo

Been playing CS for years (every version) and it is a fast action and strategic thinking game. It is a game for all ages and allows for super fun among friends. Excellent for indoors team building game. I am still learning new things about the game.
best game in the world ever
Хорошая игра, но много читеров попадается.
it's a good game, but to many cheaters and toxic kids who don't  know to play and start screaming and if they are full team u just get kicked ...and after cooldown 7  days rly GABEN ? :/
the ranking system is trash but its a must have
its a very fun game wld rec to all esp coz its free now
Hile olması bazen çok sıkıcı oluyor.
hile dışı bişi yok aq rekabetçi hvh olmuş report edince bidahaki yaa ban yemek eyrine 3 ay uzuo adam hile olmasını istior amk
в принципе если не играть то довольно хорошая игра
fajna gra. lubie i polecam. Monika.

Best games for Free or as it was at the beginning of 2019(15 euros, not so much for such a good game)
Seriously play it

Noch immer eins der Besten, wenn nicht das Beste - Taktikbasierte Egoshooter Game am Markt - Mit 4 Freunden und einem guten Mindset immer spielbar - alleine mit 4 Russen im Team -> weniger spaßig - kommt vor - jedoch nicht immer
1100多小时了，很早以前原价购入的csgo，目前官匹黄金4。我在前800多小时都是在白银局玩耍，局局送枪。现在这游戏免费了。外挂也多了，饰品也涨价了。希望vac发挥点作用，或者再将csgo变成收费游戏，这样挂会少了很多。希望早日把外挂这个问题解决。
it is a really good game
игра пиздатая, но есть много гандонов которые играют с читами
Игра достаточно хорошая. Много режимов и орудий, а так-же есть гранаты. Играть нужно на прайм статусе, ибо без него читеров слишком много. Люблю эту игру.
counterstrike goodness in a modern package
I do not recommend counter strike global offensive. It made me do horrible things to my family and friends.
